questions: Finally got Jest working after some false starts. Unfortunately, the reading from last week didn't help much.

A few features you should check out:
  • Empty lists have helpful text in them.
  • You can update a task once it's been added. Just click the text and start typing.
  • If you open multiple app windows, changes in one window will be reflected in the others. ðŸ˜Ž
